sentence.Network_en: Inverted Magus seeks, but has not yet found, his inner power.

凯尔特语中的马古斯（magus）为商场、市场的意思。名字以马古斯结尾的地点大多坐落于渡口或桥边，是当时的贸易集散地。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Latin and Greek from Old Persian maguš

means.word_mean: 1. a magician or sorcerer of ancient times
2. a member of the Zoroastrian priesthood of the ancient Persians
